inventory=[{"type": "brown_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 14}, {"type": "red_nether_bricks", "quantity": 29, "index": 17}, {"type": "diamond_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 56, "index": 29}, {"type": "phantom_spawn_egg", "quantity": 19, "index": 32}, {"type": "red_tulip", "quantity": 45, "index": 37}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 49, "index": 38}, {"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 36, "index": 41}, {"type": "coal", "quantity": 9, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a coal_block, I need to fill the crafting grid with coal. I will start by moving the coal at slot 44 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1
